thread.title: The Travel Institute Unveils Italy Destination Specialist Courses
thread.title_full: The Travel Institute Unveils Italy Destination Specialist Courses

title: The Travel Institute Unveils Italy Destination Specialist Courses
text:
Last updated: 09:45 AM ET, Fri August 14 2015 The Travel Institute Unveils Italy Destination   The Travel Institute | Claudette Covey | August 14, 2015 
Photo courtesy of The Travel Institute 
The Travel Institute has unveiled two new destination specialist (DS) courses – Northern and Central Italy, and Southern Italy and the Islands – growing its number of DS courses to 12.
